text: From Hell to Victory (Italian: Contro 4 bandiere, French: De l'enfer Ã  la victoire, Spanish: De Dunkerke a la victoria) is a 1979 Italian Spanish French World War II drama movie directed by Edmondo Amati and Umberto Lenzi. Actors include George Peppard, George Hamilton, Horst Bucholz, Ray Lovelock, Anny Duperey, Lambert Wilson, Jean-Pierre Cassel. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 drama movies Category:1979 war movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Umberto Lenzi
title: From Hell to Victory
